query:
SELECT
            c."id" as "item_id!",
            c.created_at as "created_at!",
            c.updated_at as "updated_at!",
            uh.viewed_at as "viewed_at?",
            uh.interacted_at as "interacted_at?"
        FROM
            comms_channels c
        LEFT JOIN
            comms_activity uh ON uh.channel_id = c.id
                AND uh.user_id = $1
        WHERE
            c.id = ANY($2)
        ORDER BY
            c.updated_at DESC
